name: circuit-runner-qasm3
description: A runtime program that takes one or more circuits or qasm3 string, compiles them, executes them, and optionally applies measurement error mitigation.

parameters.name: circuits
parameters.description: A circuit/qasm3 string or a list of circuits/qasm3 string.
parameters.type: A QuantumCircuit/str or a list of QuantumCircuit/str.

parameters.name: shots
parameters.description: Number of repetitions of each circuit, for sampling. Default: 1024.

parameters.name: initial_layout
parameters.description: Initial position of virtual qubits on physical qubits.

parameters.name: seed_transpiler
parameters.description: Sets random seed for the stochastic parts of the transpiler.

parameters.name: optimization_level
parameters.description: How much optimization to perform on the circuits (0-3). Higher levels generate more optimized circuits. Default is 1.

parameters.name: init_qubits
parameters.description: Whether to reset the qubits to the ground state for each shot.

parameters.name: measurement_error_mitigation
parameters.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation. Default is False. Currently, error mitigation only applies to QuantumCircuit.
